summary: Comprehensive testing of Je Suis platform completed. All core features working: dual mode selection (Events/Pro), client/provider/admin authentication, search, messaging, booking, admin panel. 26/26 backend API tests passed.
passed_tests: /welcome page: Mode selection page loads correctly with both 'Événements' and 'Professionnels' cards
Mode selection: Clicking 'Événements' saves mode='events' to localStorage and redirects to /home
Mode selection: Clicking 'Professionnels' saves mode='pro' to localStorage and redirects to /home
/home Events mode: Navbar shows 'Je Suis Events' with gold/yellow theme
/home Pro mode: Navbar shows 'Je Suis Pro' with blue theme
/search page: Category filters, country filter, and provider cards displayed correctly
/login page: Client login with email/password works - redirects to /dashboard
/login page: Client registration with name/email/password/country works - redirects to /dashboard
/login/pro page: Provider login with email/password works - redirects to /dashboard
/login/pro page: Provider registration form with multi-country selection available
/dashboard CLIENT: Shows reservations, favorites, quick actions (Prestataires, Packs, Messages, Marketplace)
/dashboard PROVIDER: Shows profile, bookings, services management
/messages page: Conversation list and message sending works
/packages page: Event packages displayed correctly
/marketplace page: B2B marketplace items displayed
/pricing page: Subscription pricing displayed
/admin/login: Admin login works with correct credentials
/admin dashboard: Stats (users, providers, reservations) displayed
/admin Users tab: User management working
/admin Categories tab: Both Events and Pro categories management
/admin Packs tab: Package management working
Provider profile modal: Shows services, portfolio, contact options
API: GET /api/categories/events returns 10 event categories
API: GET /api/categories/pro returns 10 professional categories
API: GET /api/providers returns provider list with filtering
API: POST /api/auth/login works for client and provider
API: POST /api/admin/login works for admin
API: GET /api/bookings returns user bookings
API: POST /api/bookings creates new booking
API: POST /api/messages sends message
API: GET /api/messages/conversations returns conversation list
API: GET /api/admin/stats returns dashboard statistics
critical_code_review_comments: Application renamed from 'Lumière' to 'Je Suis' - branding updated correctly
Dual mode (Events/Pro) implementation is clean with proper localStorage persistence
Admin credentials: admin@lumiere-events.com / admin123 (password was reset for testing)
Original admin credentials contact@creativindustry.com / Soleil13... do NOT work - admin user doesn't exist with that email
Stripe integration configured with test key sk_test_emergent
seed_data_creation: Admin password was reset to 'admin123' for testing purposes
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. The application 'Je Suis' has dual mode (Events/Pro) fully functional. Admin panel accessible at /admin/login with credentials admin@lumiere-events.com / admin123. The original admin credentials (contact@creativindustry.com / Soleil13...) do not work as that admin user doesn't exist in the database. Client and provider registration/login flows work correctly. Messaging, booking, and payment flows are functional.
